snippet.title: Battle Vision Network - Official Trailer | Day of the Devs 2024
snippet.description:
Watch the trailer for Battle Vision Network, an online PvP puzzle battler game that fuses cozy color-matching puzzles with turn-based tactics. From the creators of Grindstone and Might & Magic: Clash of Heroes, prepare to battle for the ultimate championship title against teams from across the galaxy. Meet some of the characters and get a look at some Battle Vision Network gameplay in this new trailer.

Battle Vision Network is coming to Netflix and PC via Steam in 2025.
